title: [GHSA-59jw-jqf4-3wq3] XStream is vulnerable to an Arbitrary Code Execution attack

[GHSA-74cv-f58x-f9wf] XStream is vulnerable to an Arbitrary File Deletion on the local host when unmarshalling as long as the executing process has sufficient rights
